Class Util

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.server.Util
public class Util extends Object
Utility class providing helper methods for server-side operations. Includes methods for parsing request bodies, handling query parameters, and updating shuttle-related data in the database.

  • Method Details

    • parseRequestBody

      public static Map<String,String> parseRequestBody(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException
      Parses the request body of an HTTP exchange into a map of key-value pairs.
      Parameters:
      exchange - The HttpExchange object containing the request.
      Returns:
      A map containing the parsed key-value pairs from the request body.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the request body is not a valid JSON object or cannot be read.

    • parseQueryParameters

      public static Map<String,String> parseQueryParameters(String query)
      Parses query parameters from a URL query string into a map of key-value pairs.
      Parameters:
      query - The query string to parse.
      Returns:
      A map containing the parsed query parameters.

    • combineJSONString

      public static String combineJSONString(List<?> items)
      Converts a list of objects into a JSON string.
      Parameters:
      items - The list of objects to convert.
      Returns:
      A JSON string representation of the list.

    • predictedReleaseTimeUpdate

      public static void predictedReleaseTimeUpdate(DatabaseFacade databaseConnection, int shuttleID, String status)
      Updates the predicted release time of a shuttle based on its status and active tasks.
      Parameters:
      databaseConnection - The database connection to use for retrieving and updating data.
      shuttleID - The ID of the shuttle to update.
      status - The current status of the shuttle.

    • orderPartDelayShuttle

      public static void orderPartDelayShuttle(DatabaseFacade databaseConnection, int shuttleID)
      Applies a random delay to the predicted release time of a shuttle.
      Parameters:
      databaseConnection - The database connection to use for retrieving and updating data.
      shuttleID - The ID of the shuttle to delay.
